title: Venezuela Plans to Grant More Oil Blocks to Chevron, Repsol
description: Venezuela plans to grant more oil-production land to Chevron Corp. and Spain’s Repsol SA as the Trump administration pushes for private companies to rebuild the nation’s energy sector, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
content: Venezuela plans to grant more oil-production land to Chevron Corp. and Spain’s Repsol SA as the Trump administration pushes for private companies to rebuild the nation’s energy sector, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
